about_the_game:
Journey to humanity's most ambitious expedition yet - a mysterious paradise planet orbiting the mighty red supergiant Antares. As one of the first explorers to set foot on this alien world, you'll experience its wonders in stunning virtual reality that pushes the boundaries of visual fidelity.

Equipped with cutting-edge propulsion technology, your jetpack gives you unprecedented freedom to explore this vast alien landscape. Soar between floating islands, dive into crystal-clear alien oceans, and rocket up sheer cliff faces as you uncover the secrets of this unexplored world. If you can see it, you can reach it - no artificial boundaries or invisible walls will hold you back.

Key Features:

  • True Open-World Freedom: No invisible walls, no locked paths—explore every inch of the vast, alien landscape. From sprawling forests and jagged mountain ranges to glowing bioluminescent caverns, the only limit is your curiosity and fuel in your jetpack.

  • Alien Paradise Planet, Perfectly Realized: Immerse yourself in a living, breathing world crafted with ultra-realistic visuals. Every detail—from the shimmer of alien flora to the sweeping views of unknown planets on the sky—pulls you deeper into its mysteries and beauty.

  • Virtual Reality at Its Peak: Experience the thrill of true presence as you walk, fly, fall, and soar through the planet’s diverse biomes. Advanced VR graphics make every step, leap, and discovery feel tangible. Ultra-realistic graphics bring an alien world to life with unprecedented detail

  • Secrets Waiting to be Uncovered: Beneath the planet's serene surface lies a wealth of secrets—ancient ruins, strange or earth like creatures, and a story as vast as the world itself. Will you uncover the mysteries of one of undiscovered planet of Antares star, or simply lose yourself in its beauty?

  • Day/Night Cycle: Experience breathtaking binary sunsets as Antares paints the alien sky in brilliant crimson hues

  • Dynamic Jetpack Movement: Master fluid, physics-based flight controls as you soar through alien skies and mystery landscapes

Equipped with cutting-edge propulsion technology, your jetpack gives you unprecedented freedom to explore this vast alien landscape. movies.name: Secrets of Antares - Early Access Official Trailer

name: Secrets of Antares

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 2080 or AMD 7700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest 2, Quest 3, Valve Index, Mixed Reality, Vive
  • Additional Notes: Tested with Virtual Desktop on Medium resolution and 72FPS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 13700 or AMD Ryzen 9 7900X
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 4070 or AMD 7900XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • VR Support: Quest 2, Quest 3, Valve Index, Mixed Reality, Vive
  • Additional Notes: Tested with Virtual Desktop on Ultra resolution and 90FPS

short_description: Embark on a breathtaking journey to the mysterious and uncharted planet orbiting the Antares star. Secrets of Antares is a groundbreaking VR game that combines unparalleled freedom, ultra-realistic graphics, and true open-world exploration.
